name: Gardens of Gnome
description:
Grow a cosy garden in this meditative single-player board game written for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.

Pan the board with WASD or the arrow keys.

Art by Anplay, Me.Artzz, and Captain Katt.
Systems by Vizipokemon and Spindlebink.
Music and sound design by Spindlebink using some CC0 sounds from Freesound.org.
